pages.title: Listener
pages.text: The Listener is a block that will listen to notes played around it and output a Redstone signal if a note matches the Listener's configured filter criteria.

pages.title: Settings
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Filter Note$(): Which note(s) the Listener should respond to. The value can be all, a particular note (EX: C5), any note of a octave (EX: *5), or any octave of a note (EX: C*).$(br)$(li)$(l)Filter Instrument$(): Which instrument(s) the listener should respond to. Value can be one specific instrument or any instrument $(italic)except for$() one specific instrument.
$(li)$(l)Trigger Mode$(): Whether the listener should emit a Redstone signal the entire time a note is held or just when a note starts.
